*In addition to this edition, Deluxe Edition and Ultimate Edition are also available. Please be careful not to purchase the same content twice.

item.title: UNDERDOGS
item.description:
About This Game



Wrap yourself in 5 tons of metal and go smashing through a dark scene of UNDERGROUND MECH FIGHTS! Bash, crush, maul and rip apart enemy bots and mechs.

IT’S FULL-ON METAL-ON-METAL VIOLENCE IN THIS PHYSICS-BASED MECH BRAWLER!



But rampaging through the pits ain’t all - THIS IS A ROGUELIKE.
Gear up with 120+ items including power tools to customize your mech, meet 30+ characters, hire hackers and saboteurs, hustle and deal with the gangsters and psychos who run these streets as you claw your way up the food chain.



This city is a dog-eat-dog shit show, but luckily you ain't alone.
Your little bruv King is in your corner - calling out threats and giving you lip while you fight like a wild animal, smashing car sized pit bots that wanna kill you dead to the deafening roars of the blood thirsty crowds.

This is New Brakka - The Mech Fighting Capital of the World.
This is UNDERDOGS.

Welcome to the jungle.

item.title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
item.description:
About This Game



EPIC EMOTIONAL DRAMA
Two larger-than-life heroes brought together by the hand of fate, or perhaps something more sinister…

Ichiban Kasuga, an unstoppable underdog who’s no stranger to crawling up from rock bottom, and Kazuma Kiryu, a broken man facing down his last days.



BEST-IN-CLASS RPG ACTION
Experience one-of-a-kind combat with dynamic, fast-paced RPG battles where the battlefield becomes your weapon, and anything goes. Adapt your party’s skills to the situation with outlandish jobs and customizations to strategically subdue enemies with over-the-top moves.



INFINITE ADVENTURE
Live it up in Japan and explore all that Hawaii has to offer in an adventure so big it spans the Pacific. Unforgettable moments await at every step of the journey with a unique mix of quests and activities to enjoy at your leisure.



Deluxe Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more

Ultimate Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more
- Assorted Outfit Bundle: Customize your party's look with outfits & swimwear
- Sujimon & Resort Bundle: Get legendary Sujimon, resort guests and special boosters
- Yakuza CD Collection Set: Increase your in-game playlist with classic karaoke tracks

item.title: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney Trilogy
item.description:
About This Game



Apollo Justice's Legal Journey Begins Anew!

Join rookie attorney Apollo Justice and his mentor, the legendary Phoenix Wright, in this collection of 3 games! This title features the 14 episodes of "Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney", "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies", and "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Spirit of Justice", and the 2 previously DLC-only Special Episodes for a total of 16 episodes!

Also included is a mountain of extra goodies that's sure to satisfy any Ace Attorney fan!

Orchestra Hall - Listen to the in-game background music and select orchestral arrangements!

Art Library - View illustrations, design specs, commissioned pieces, and even the special Spirit of Justice Prologue anime!

Animation Studio - Play around with character animations and recreate your favorite scenes!

This collection supports Japanese, English, French, German, Korean, and Traditional and Simplified Chinese. Mix and match to play in whichever languages you'd like!

Immerse yourself in this beautiful collection as you shout "Objection!" in these newly renovated halls of justice!

Some of the contents of the games in this collection are presented as initially released to preserve the games as originally created.

item.title: UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH II Sys:Celes
item.description:
About This Game

Sys:Celes sinks towards ruination.
For the Immortalize, the collapse of all that is, looms on the horizon.
The curtain rises on the final chapter of the Hollow Night. Catastrophe beckons...


Experience the Dramatic Stylish 2D Fighting Action in the latest entry of the UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH series!

The first numbered sequel in the series!

▼ Choose from a roster of 24 total characters, with renewed visuals!


3 new characters join the battle: Moonlight Dancer "Twin Barrel Beauty" Kaguya, Indomitable Rampart "Steel Guardian" Tsurugi, and Endless Entity "Eternal Re-Birth" Kuon.
You won’t be able to take your eyes off the intense battles between these 24 fighters with the highly detailed HD pixel art graphics!

▼ Simple inputs make it easy to jump into the fray!


New to fighting games? Not a problem – simple inputs mean even beginners can pull off moves with a single button!

▼ Now supporting rollback netcode for an improved online experience!


With the addition of Casual Matches, it’s easier than ever before to dive in and enjoy online battles.

▼ Introducing new moves and game mechanics!


All characters now boast new moves, such as Hyde’s Blaring Outrage and Linne’s Soaring Dragon.
The new game mechanics Creeping Edge and Celestial Vorpal open up additional depth to gameplay.

▼ The final chapter! A new tale of the Hollow Night…

Sever the cycle. An end to the endless.
May the tale of these countless Nights be concluded, on this eve, the moment of destiny.
A long-awaited continuation to the tale of the Hollow Night unfolds!

item.title: Summon Masters
item.description:
About This Game

This is a card and board game with the following features:

Deck Building: Players can build their own decks to battle with. Depending on different strategies and opponents, players can choose different cards to counter.

Tactical Gameplay: The game uses a 3x10 chessboard, and players can freely place cards to fight. Players need to develop tactics and arrange card positions and usage order within limited space.

Different Professions: Players can choose freely from four professions - swordsman, mage, monk, and archer. Each profession has different characteristics and skills, and players can choose according to their preferences and tactical needs.

Competitive Battles: Players can battle with other players after building their decks, and it is fun to fight with other people. Through battles with other players, players can improve their strength and tactical skills.

Team Dungeons: In addition to fighting against other players, players can also team up with others to challenge high-difficulty dungeons. Players need to defeat powerful bosses through cooperation and strategy to get more rewards and cards.

Special Challenges: Players can participate in special rules challenges and use their intelligence to defeat other players. These special rules make the game more interesting and challenging, and players need to constantly think and try new strategies.

Fast-paced: Each game is fast-paced (within 5 minutes), and can be played in short fragments of time. The fast pace of the game allows players to enjoy the game in a short time, while also being able to play at any time and anywhere.

item.title: Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

Take the helm of a classic Russian locomotive, discover the raw beauty and wildness of Siberia and try to survive on the longest railway line in the world. This is the Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator. A game for real adventurers!



Complete the tutorial and the first kilometers of the route for free.



The Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator offers amazing rail and survival challenges on real Russian dangerous routes. Feel what it is like to put your hands at the helm of a powerful freight locomotive and explore the untouched natural landscape that is sure to delight you.

Prologue features:

  • Detailed simulation of driving a VL10 locomotive - the locomotive control is slightly simplified.
  • Locomotive repair system - Manage and replace locomotive parts that are constantly wearing out.
  • Train traffic simulation - Follow rail signs and signals to avoid derailment or damage to a part of the locomotive.
  • Work system - Earn by completing transport orders.
  • Game modes (Survival) and (Simulator). It is recommended to play in the (Survival) mode. This is the leading game mode that is constantly being developed.
    For players who are not interested in survival mechanics, a simple Simulator mode is available.
  • Mafia system - Complete missions for the mafia to earn extra money.
  • Survival system with statistics of hunger, thirst, alcohol, hangover, disease and hypothermia - Eat and drink to avoid death.
    Keep the right temperature so you don't freeze.
  • Shooting system - Use your weapons for hunting and self-defense.
  • Purchase and sales system - Buy various items, food, tools, weapons and ammunition.
  • Locomotive inspection mode - Inspect the condition of locomotive parts and replace them in time to avoid damage.
  • Dynamic weather system with day and night cycle - Survive extreme weather conditions.
  • Route from (Novosibirsk-West) to (Novosibirsk-Main) - scale 1:1. Buy the full version with the route from (Novosibirsk-West) to (Krasnoyarsk).
  • Police system - A corrupt militia watches over your movements.
  • Much more to discover.

item.title: Lil' Guardsman
item.description:
About This Game

In this deduction adventure, you play as Lil - an unlikely 12-year-old hero - covering your dad's shift at the guard shed and are tasked with deciding the fate of over 100 unique characters.

You will question humans, elves, goblins, cyclopes, and other fantasy creatures using your powers of deduction to determine who to admit or deny based on how they respond to your questions and your trusty tools. Sending visitors to jail, inadvertently zapping them to smithereens, or letting them go on their merry way are all part of the job. But be careful: who you let through the castle gates will determine the kingdom's fate.



See the Sprawl and its fantastical & quirky citizens through a royal wedding to one of two kingdoms vying for an alliance, and a subsequent siege by whoever you've angered in the process. Your decisions can determine the fate of the city and its people!





Interrogate 100+ fully voiced characters in just the right way to earn a perfect score.





Spend your hard earned gold wisely on powering up your guardsman toolkit, and strategically deploy these to admit or deny the right people or...goblins?





Use your trusty Chronometer3000 to go back and get a higher score... but be careful not to break space and time in the process.

item.title: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608270/Intravenous_2/


Step into the shoes of Gideon, a ruthless mercenary who cares about nothing but his wealth. Set two months before the events of Intravenous 2, you will take on seemingly simple jobs, the effects of which will ripple out and affect the main game's protagonist. But why should Gideon care? He's just in it for the money.

Key Features


  • Stealth or Firepower: the choice is yours. Sneak through shadows, turn off the lights, pick doors, or unleash a hail of bullets. The game will adapt to your play style.
  • Customize Your Skills: develop your skills the way you want to, whether it's mastering the art of stealth or becoming a gunslinging virtuoso.
  • Bullet Time: Gideon is no stranger to stimulants that enhance his cognitive abilities - bending time to give him the edge in tense situations.
  • Vast Arsenal: choose from firearms, gadgets, and a variety of ammo types to creatively tackle the challenge
  • Weapon Modification: personalize each firearm with suppressors, laser sights, and more, tailoring your arsenal to the task at hand.
  • Responsive AI: engage in intense combat with enemies that react to your actions, take cover, use tactics and call for backup.

item.title: Artifact Seeker:Prologue
item.description:
About This Game


The difference between the prologue version and the official version
There is a special artifact in the prologue
Characters: 2 in the prologue, at least 5 in the official version
Maps: 2 in the prologue, 3 in the final version.
Systems: Tavern, Marketplace, and Endless Mode will be added to the game.
Artifacts: More artifacts will be added to the game.
Skills: More skills will be added in the official version.
Affixes: More Affixes will be added in the official version.
Events: There will be more interesting Events in the official version.
Progress: No need to worry, all progress will be carry into the official version.


Artifact Seeker is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game. A game of gods, with Aurorium as the board, And all the mortals as their pawns and swords. You can obtain artifacts by slaying corrupted enemies, collecting gold to exchange it for artifacts at mysterious merchants. How to use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods? to end the game of gods or to become a god yourself. Artifact Seeker, Your choice.



Dozens of evolvable skills, extreme sprint dash, and the ultimate special skill to slay enemies!



Intense paced battles, you can buy artifacts to boost your power after each battle!



Hundreds of different artifacts with matching skills to create a wide variety of bond Synergy, and utilize the power of the synergy to challenge higher level enemies! [/b]



RPG like Events, diverse choices, adventuring dungeons, exploring magical worlds, befriend different heroes and unlock new characters!



Hundreds of affixes and attributes, dozens of different meta-progressions, weapon unlocking and strengthening, and sharing your own unique artifacts with your pals! There's new contents to experience after every run!



Explore the world and discover the hidden secrets behind the story!

item.title: MetaGraph
item.description:
About This Game

MetaGraph - Unravel the Enigmas of a Virtual Desktop Realm

Dive into an exciting puzzle adventure with MetaGraph, a unique desktop game that fires up your imagination and challenges your brain. Play as a digital archaeologist exploring a virtual world resembling your desktop but filled with secrets and puzzles.

Immerse yourself in a gripping puzzles, unraveling the mysteries of an ancient digital civilization. Each landscape hides a distinct puzzle waiting to be solved with every click. MetaGraph combines puzzles and storytelling with cyberpunk-inspired visuals and an awesome soundtrack.

In this mind-bending game, face challenges that test your logic, creativity, and problem-solving skills. Manipulate time, defy physics, and bend reality to overcome unconventional obstacles.

MetaGraph is not just a game; it's a visually stunning experience unlocking digital secrets. With easy controls and various tools, dive into endless puzzle-solving possibilities.

Get ready to explore the wonders of MetaGraph beyond your desktop. Can you decipher the mysterious universe? Take on the ultimate puzzle challenge and become the master of MetaGraph's virtual desktop realm!

item.title: BellyBots
item.description:
About This Game

Ladies and gentlemen. Load your guns!

Teleport into our roomscale reimagination of an 80s arcade action game.

Warning:
You will have to move... A LOT! :D

BellyBots is exclusively available for the HTC Vive.

item.title: BellyBots
item.description:
About This Game

Ladies and gentlemen. Load your guns!

Teleport into our roomscale reimagination of an 80s arcade action game.

Warning:
You will have to move... A LOT! :D

BellyBots is exclusively available for the HTC Vive.

item.title: IceFitter
item.description:
About This Game

This is a puzzle game where you aim to clear levels by fitting ice blocks into holes.
It's a simple operation that involves moving blocks on the field up, down, left, or right, but as the level increases, the difficulty becomes more and more challenging.
The ice block will continue to slide until it hits an obstacle, so it's important to think about how you can stop it at the desired point.
There is no element of luck or action, so it is recommended for people who simply enjoy solving puzzles.

item.title: Hoverkitty In The Hoververse Chapter Three
item.description:
About This Game

Hoverkitty in the Hoververse Chapter Three is the third game in the Hoverkitty in the Hoververse series. The Hoververse series is about a robotic cat traveling around a planet called the Hoververse, protecting it and the creatures that live within the world from the clutches of malicious entities.

In this 3D game, you can explore the land, and soon you will find that there is something amiss, something that could upend the Hoververse. Things are not as they should be, and it is up to our unlikely, yet valiant hero and heroine to put things back in order and bring peace back to the Hoververse.

For the first time in the series, you can discover the mysterys of the Hoververse as either Hoverkitty or Hoverflea, which means you have multiple ways of completing a level. Hoverkitty is a robotic cat that can wield a sword for close combat, and Hoverflea is a robotic flea that shoots lasers for skirmishes that can be fought further away.

A quest that you will find in most levels is Treat collecting. Sometimes you must collect Treats to pass a level. Hoverkitty and Hoverflea can both collect Treats, but one advantage to playing as Hoverflea is that he is smaller than Hoverkitty, which means he can fit in smaller areas.

This has aspects of an adventure,3D, first-person shooter. You will meet old enemies, such as the Hoverkitty Hunters, and also new allies that can help you in the Battle for the Hoververse.

This game also has some lore to it, for all you Hoverkitty fans out there, so be on the look out for some new an old faces and facts.

item.title: Year3055
item.description:
About This Game

The game is in the year 3055, when AI robots have taken over the world. The human race is on the brink of extinction. Will Captain Miles find a way to end the terror that the AI Robots are causing?



General Tyler contacted Captain Miles to come to the base to solve this AI problem.

Year3055 is a 3rd person shooter adventure game, where you control a character named Captain Miles through 4 chapters of the game.



Upon purchase, chapters 1 and 2 of the game will be available.

Chapters 3 and 4 will be available later on during the year.

Multiplayer, arcade mode will be available soon.

In Chapter 1, the player will be teleported into the underground sewer system where he will deal with melee enemies. In Chapter 2, As the player is back at the base, the AIs will become tougher to deal with. Is that a gun that they have? That's ok, I have something way better!

item.title: Pixel Noir
item.description:
About This Game

There was something rotten in that old hospital. You were just following your instincts that night. But, it was your pride that killed those people, including your partner on the force. With nothing to exonerate you, on a temporary insanity defense, they threw the book at you.


For ten years, you were haunted by unanswered questions, frightened by what you saw, and what you did. Now you’re scraping by as a private eye, operating out of a crummy apartment. One day, a strange case comes along, giving you an opportunity to clear your name once and for all. With your sanity at stake and rent to pay, how can you refuse?


Solve a wide variety of mysteries as Pinnacle City's cheapest Private Eye! From missing pets to murder investigations, your detective skills will either earn you fortune or face punches.


Home to a wretched hive of scum and villainy, Pinnacle City is littered with black market trade, grafters, and players of all kinds. From the shadowy alleys of The Sprawl to the sleek skyscrapers of Uptown, each district holds its own charm and mysteries to uncover!


Each member of your entourage has their own distinctive personality and skill set. Some will follow you into battle. Others will try and undermine you. Who will you choose for your lineup and will they be with you until the bitter end?


Bad guys can jump out at you from anywhere and each gang in Pinnacle City has its own devastating attacks! But you can beat 'em back in turn-based combat using timed hits and blocks to increase or reduce damage. You can also partner with your entourage members to unleash devastating combo attacks!


Manuscripts teach entourage members a wide variety of skills. Learned skills can then be upgraded by skill points you get from solving major cases. With each upgrade, skills become more powerful, and your entourage can take on even more powerful enemies.


Tune up your gear with modifications to fit your play style. Experiment with different mods and ammo types to deal varying types of damage and inflict status effects on enemies. Whether you prefer a technical approach or go in guns blazing, modifying your gear is key as you battle your way through the city.

item.title: Ninjurate
item.description:
About This Game

Enter the thrilling world of Ninjurate, where ancient ninjas rise to the defense of a mysterious jungle island surrounded by a mighty sea. The island has become the scene of a battle with zombie pirates, revived from forgotten times.
You are armed with shurikens that fly like lightning towards the target. Use your throwing skills to accurately hit zombie pirates and protect the island.
Take on waves of zombie pirates, each with their own unique attack style. Upgrade your ninja skills to deal with more difficult enemies, and unlock new levels as you uncover the secrets of the island.
Take on the challenge in Ninjurate and become a legend as you fight in an exciting battle between ninjas and zombie pirates on this mysterious island in the heart of the jungle!

item.title: Souls : "위령"
item.description:
About This Game

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Souls: 위령" is a first-person, exploratory horror game.
You must find the souls that exist in the mansion, and avoid the demons that protect them.
Use your equipment to find and track souls.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Story]

Hyun-sung, who is working as a fear-related influencer, visits the abandoned house once a week under the theme of exploring the abandoned house.
On this day, he was informed that there was an old mansion in a very quiet mountain where the rich would have lived before, and he took his luggage and entered the mountain.
When I arrived, it looked scarier than I thought, and it was a wonderfully somewhat managed mansion.
As soon as I opened the door of the mansion after deep consideration, someone struck Hyunseong, and when I came to my senses, I opened my eyes from the cold floor.
Hyun-sung tries to escape from the mansion to survive there.
But someone had been prevented from leaving the mansion, and through the letters in the mansion, I could find a clue to escape.

Hyun-sung, who was searching the house, found something strange,
There were signs of a certain ritual in the house, and Hyeon-seong felt that he would also be a sacrifice to be used in this ritual.
In order to live, Hyeon-seong has to do something.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Game Description]

Your purpose is to find the soul and release it.
Hint in the mansion Get game items through paper, find the souls trapped in the mansion, and free yourself, too.

You need to use a total of four items to find your soul.

In particular, the camera automatically charges the battery, but be careful because it cannot be used if it is permanently damaged when used.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'm sensitive to the sound of demons.
There are a total of two demons, and they will reject you because they serve to protect their souls.

Be careful because one devil is usually invisible.

item.title: Ani-Chess
item.description:
About This Game

On this charming animal-themed chessboard, take turns activating pieces with opponents, utilizing each animal's distinct abilities to secure victories in every battle.

In each turn, prioritize strategic activation sequences, select targets sensibly, find appropriate positions, and avoid getting surrounded. Additionally, be prepared for unexpected team combinations.

Compose a team from over 50 species of unique animals.
Navigate through a series of continuous levels, encountering advantages and disadvantages based on the terrain and animal combinations.
Beware of rabbits and mice! They might bring unexpected outcomes...

item.title: HELLDIVERS™ 2
item.description:
About This Game


The Galaxy’s Last Line of Offence.

Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.

URGENT BROADCAST – SUPER EARTH ARMED FORCES

Freedom. Peace. Democracy.
Your Super Earth-born rights. The key pillars of our civilization.
Of our very existence.
But the war rages on. And everything is once again under threat.
Join the greatest military force the galaxy has ever seen and make this a safe and free place to live.

BECOME A LEGEND

You will be assembled into squads of up to four Helldivers and assigned strategic missions.
Watch each other’s back – friendly fire is an unfortunate certainty of war, but victory without teamwork is impossible.

LOADOUTS

Rain down freedom from above, sneak through enemy territory, or grit your teeth and charge head-first into the jaws of combat.
How you deliver liberty is your choice; you’ll have access to a wide array of explosive firepower, life-saving armor and battle-changing stratagems… the jewel in every Helldiver’s arsenal.

REQUISITION

Super Earth recognises your hard work with valuable Requisition. Use it to access different rewards that benefit you, your squad, your destroyer ship and our overall war effort.


THREATS

Everything on every planet wants you dead. That’s what we’re dealing with.
Each enemy has distinct and unpredictable characteristics, tactics, and behavior – but they all fight ferociously and without fear or morality.

THE GALACTIC WAR

Capturing enemy planets, defending against invasions, and completing missions will contribute to our overall effort.


This war will be won or lost depending on the actions of everyone involved.

We stand together, or we fall apart.

item.title: super bad hero
item.description:
About This Game

One day, the Toilet Star people came to Earth, they liked to eat chicken, and they took all the chickens! They have created a large number of enhanced clone soldiers and sent extraterrestrial troops to collect chickens on Earth. You are a female warrior codenamed Black Blood, and you must use and strengthen your firearms to eliminate all enemies and save all chickens!
This is a FPS shooting game where enemies come in waves. After eliminating the current wave of enemies, you can purchase ammunition, upgrade your guns, armor, and more to eliminate the next wave of enemies.
The game uses physics engines, bullet time, and many parody types of enemies, such as sirens, toilet people, gun demons, superheroes emitting laser light, etc. It is a bit like the 3D version of 'Metal Slug' or the gun version of 'Blade and Sorcery', which is very exciting and interesting. The operation is very simple, you can control it using the arrow keys and mouse.

item.title: Xplosive Raccoon
item.description:
About This Game

You play as a raccoon who, having mastered dynamite, decided to go fishing and catch fish in order to earn money and pay off all his debts.
Catch fish with explosions and earn money and remember that even dynamite costs money. Day or night, it doesn't matter, you have to pay off all your debts, but they grow and grow.

Xplosive Raccoon - is a point-and-click game where you have to aim the dynamite, throw using the mouse cursor while holding the left mouse button and select the force of the throw. Use the explosion to send fish ashore and earn money, the faster you pay off your debt, the faster you can go home.

Control:
Left Mouse Button - to throw


Game Features:
- Visual style
- Physical World
- Difficulty

item.title: YourFigureOut
item.description:
About This Game

In this crazy game you play as one of the forms whose goal is to survive in this chaos!
You are a random figure in this chaos, who finds yourself in the attention of other hostile figures who are trying to push you out of bounds or push you into a wall.

YourFigureOut - Using the mouse and left-clicking, set the direction and speed of the flight of your figure, which should not touch the walls and dodge hostile figures that are trying to push you against the wall!

Control:
Left Mouse Button - Launch Figure

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Reaction
- Difficulty

item.title: Dungeon of Stone
item.description:
About This Game

You just woke up and you don't know who or where you are. How did you get to this place? How are you going to get out? Make your way through hallways full of enemies and traps, discover who you are and find a way to escape.

Explore dungeons.



Solve puzzles to advance.



Level up and learn new skills.



Key features:

  • 20 dungeons to explore.
  • Real-time battles.
  • Choose between 3 different classes.
  • Variety of enemies.

item.title: KONOSUBA - God's Blessing on this Wonderful World! Love For These Clothes Of Desire!
item.description:
About This Game


Follow Kazuma and company, as they discover a mysterious "Black Slab" which curses them with desires contrary to their personality. The gang must now find and feed ingredients to the slab to create outfits which match and fulfil their new desires, and thus break their curse. Are you ready to meet Darkness as a ruthless dominatrix? How about Aqua as a prim and proper goddess? Or Megumin as the proud leader of the Lolita League?




Witness a new story in visual novel form! Featuring a full cast of fan-favourite characters from the series, this wild adventure gives you the chance to build up affection with up to seven heroines!




Fill out a weekly planner for each character based on their strengths to earn funds and resources which can be used for making outfits.




Each of them has her own story endings and special dress-up CGs, so pick your words wisely and avoid invoking their wrath! Your choices matter!




Collect resources to create outfits by completing tasks and quests. Manage your finances carefully to afford the materials you are missing, and prioritise gathering the outfit-specific ingredients you will need.




Once the mystical outfits have been made it’s time to play dress-up! Be ready for twists and turns as your favourite characters’ personalities change with each curse and desire-fulfilling piece of clothing.

item.title: Parkour Posse
item.description:
About This Game

In Parkour Posse, two players take turns as the “runner” and “on-deck” moving through a level. When the 1st player reaches the end of a level, they switches places so the 2nd player can make the return trip. The runner will control the onscreen character moving, jumping, and dodging their way across the level. The player on-deck will be responsible for controlling the camera so the runner gets a better view, and providing helpful boosts when the runner needs them most.



The level doesn’t reset between runs, so anything the 1st player does in the level can potentially affect the 2nd. Level completion times are cumulative, so it’s important to work together to achieve the fastest times! Work together to run, jump, and dodge your way through 20 levels in theme park of a lifetime!

item.title: 烟花绘梦 Firework Survivor
item.description:
About This Game

Have you ever wondered what your kitty will be dreaming about on New Year’s Eve?

"Fireworks Dream" is a survivor Like game with the theme of fireworks. In the game, you will enter the dreamland of a kitten, which is full of dangers, but the only thing that can help it is - fireworks! You will help this kitten fight off monsters in the New Year's Eve nightmare, find clues to break the nightmare, and return to its owner.

In the game, you will experience:

The game is based on the classic survivor gameplay framework. Upgrading, strengthening, and spawning monsters are still important parts of the game.

However, the weapons that can be used this time will be various types of fireworks that are common during the New Year festival.

There seems to be some special chemical reactions between various fireworks weapons.

Maybe you can find a familiar figure among them, and of course there are some unique surprises waiting for you to discover.

But please do not imitate the in-game operations in real life. ;)


The game will use simple interactions to tell a heart-warming story. The story revolves around the bond and emotional bond between the kitten and its owner, and demonstrates the kitten's overcoming of fear and cultivation of courage through the challenges of each dream.


I believe you will eventually help the kitten return to its owner, but you don’t need to worry about the lonely time after sending the kitten away, because we have also prepared a fireworks viewing mode for you. In this mode you can freely adjust the fireworks you want to watch within certain limits.

You can even launch fireworks yourself.

Discover the fireworks show you most want to see!
In addition, we have also prepared a set of achievement patterns with a festive atmosphere, maybe you will need them.

Finally, make good use of the fireworks on hand and paint your dreams with a bright color during festivals that require fireworks!

item.title: 我的队伍勇往直前
item.description:
About This Game

Join a addictive roguelike game where you constantly recruit human warriors and form powerful combat teams to complete challenges.

When facing waves of enemies such as undead, elf, and orc with increasing strength, purchase appropriate weapons and equipment, select appropriate skills, and form a powerful faction.

A series of light and joyful yet passionate battles, leading your warriors to charge happily and enjoy the fun of electronic cricket fighting!

1. There are four different game modes, each with its own unique features, providing you with a rich and interesting challenge experience.

2. Recruit warriors from different professions and talents, form powerful faction teams, and activate the bond effect.

3. Select equipment for heroes, activate traits, eat food, and further enhance their abilities.

4. Fight in various environments and against different enemies, carefully select your opponents and defeat them!

item.title: Hook Line & Sinker
item.description:
About This Game

You're a Ninja cast into the Sea and landed on an Island trapped by the Sea Lords.
With your trusty ninja skills and the gold Hook you acquired, make your way out of the Island by defeating all your enemies...and the Marine Life around it.

Catch Fish, earn gold and defeat the Sea Lords to escape the Island! A top down shooter with a fishing twist.
With your trusty hook you will hook dash, swing in the ocean, throw bombs, earn gold and fight your way out to victory.

Chain up to 200 catches and defeats bosses to obtain Scales in the Shrine to power up.
Earn Teeths for defeating bosses and earn permanent upgrades and gain access to multiple weapons that work better for different phases.

Defeat with the Sea Lords with all the Ninja tools you have!

item.title: Desktop Zoo
item.description:
About This Game

Desktop pet cute, your desktop icon becomes a small animal, desktop zoo gives you a different experience...

Game Content
  • 1. Desktop hanging game, the system randomly generates small animals based on your desktop icons, and generates a ranking list based on the length of hanging time.
  • 2. More than 40 cute little animals to generate!

item.title: SHIJIE XIUXIAN
item.description:
About This Game

《SHIJIE XIUXIAN》中文名：《师姐修仙》

Welcome to the world of fairy XIUXIAN. What should you do when you are suddenly invaded by an unknown world dimension in the world of XIUXIAN? SHIJIE comprehend immortal techniques, cultivate immortal bodies, and strengthen immortal treasures. The collision of the power of two worlds begins. Prepare to fight!

The world of XIUXIAN has many fascinating environments and atmospheres, as well as countless wonderful stories and legends, which constitute the unique culture and history of this world.

SHIJIE XIUXIAN Contents:
* Up to 50 Adventure Mode levels.Up to 50 character talents.
* Challenge to become powerful
* Formations
* 18 Binding combinations
* Hundreds of skills.
* Lucky events to enhance yourself
* Permanent Weapon Attribute Archive
* Endless infinite attributes

item.title: ぐうたら娘更生計画 ～Neet Girl Rehabilitation Plan～
item.description:
About This Game

『ぐうたら娘更生計画～Neet Girl Rehabilitation Plan～』is a visual novel game about rehabilitating beautiful girls who have become NEETs for various reasons. Repeating dates as a form of support for social reintegration and rewards, gradually deepening the relationships from work partners to romantic interests.
A Bishojo Game released in 2021 under the "Calcite" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players around the world to enjoy.


◆Introduction
"I will do whatever you say if you start your job hunting."
The girls found my proposal interesting and accepted the conditions.

The reward they requested is... a date with me!?


◆Synopsis
The protagonist, Yutaro Miki is a rookie NEET rehabilitation officer.
A NEET rehabilitation officer is a staff member of a publicly funded, privately operated organization dedicated to the "rehabilitation of NEETs".
With the ongoing increase in NEETs becoming a serious public issue, Yutaro suddenly finds himself assigned to handle three female NEETs.

Mei Natsume, who is lethargic and sloppy.
Kagami Yumitsuki, who has excessive paranoid delusions.
Kaede Suda, who constantly demands game competitions.

After meeting with the three and returning to the workplace, Yutaro accidentally overhears a conversation between his superiors on break.
"If he can't rehabilitate any of the three, it would be tough for him here on out."

If things don't go well, not only failing in rehabilitation, Yutaro himself may become an internal NEET in the company!
Will Yutaro successfully rehabilitate the lazy girls and help them find new employment?


◆Characters
・Mei Natsume
"You must be going through a tough time~ It's good being unemployed, don't have to worry about any problems."
A carefree, classic-style NEET with great fashion sense and flashy hair color.
Even asking various questions about job hunting, she skillfully changes the subject with nonchalant responses.
Lacking motivation and having low self-esteem, she has no particular interest in any job.

・Kagami Yumitsuki
"Not with anyone you dummy, it's fun being with you."
A tsundere university NEET who has quite a neat appearance.
She rejects every job offer that the protagonist recommends with many excuses.
Being a member of a literature club, she is well-versed in manga and sometimes gives recommendations.

・Kaedeko Suda
"You are so simple. Let's enjoy more strategic maneuvering."
The youngest among the three. A younger-sister-type college student NEET skilled in depending on others
She often observes the protagonist, and quickly notices even the slightest changes or worries.
She spends more time playing games together than having discussions as she loves gaming.

・Yutaro Miki
A NEET rehabilitation officer affiliated with the rehabilitation institution, with a background in counseling.
Despite being a rookie, he was assigned to three individuals due an unusual increase in NEETs,
The days of being swayed by the lazy girls have begun...!

item.title: Van Gogh's Masterpiece Jigsaw Puzzles
item.description:
About This Game

"Welcome to the world of "Van Gogh's Masterpiece Jigsaw Puzzles," a rich and immersive puzzle game that pays tribute to the artistic style of the legendary Vincent van Gogh. This game is not just a collection of puzzles; it's a journey through art, creativity, and inspiration, enhanced by the opportunity to unlock Steam Achievements.

Artistic Exploration:
Engage in puzzles that range from a calming 30 pieces to an intricate 285 pieces. Each puzzle is designed with swirling strokes, vibrant colors, and expressive textures that echo Van Gogh's unique artistic expression. Though not direct replicas of his works, the puzzles transport players into a world filled with starlit skies, sun-kissed fields, and landscapes that breathe life, all reminiscent of Van Gogh's creative spirit.

A Journey Through Creativity:
The game's landscape is more than a series of puzzles; it's a tribute to artistic exploration. Anchored by a beautifully designed map, the game represents a journey through a world inspired by Van Gogh's techniques and vision. Each solved puzzle adds life and color to this world, unlocking regions that dance with the same passion and intensity found in Van Gogh's brushstrokes.

Challenges, Rewards, and Steam Achievements:
"Van Gogh's Masterpiece Jigsaw Puzzles" offers various challenges that cater to both beginners and seasoned puzzle enthusiasts. Timed challenges, hidden objects, and special achievements add layers of excitement and complexity to the game. Earn rewards, unlock special tools, and discover hidden content that enhances the gameplay experience. The opportunity to unlock Steam Achievements adds an extra layer of accomplishment, allowing players to track their progress and earn recognition within the Steam community.

Artistic Homage:
What sets this game apart is its artistic homage. Each puzzle is a celebration of Van Gogh's influence, capturing the essence of his style without replicating his exact works. The assembly process becomes a journey through art, where every piece connects you to the soul of one of history's most inspiring painters.

Educational Insights:
Learn about Van Gogh's life, his artistic evolution, and the stories behind his masterpieces. The game offers educational insights that enrich the player's understanding of art history, making the experience both entertaining and enlightening.

Community and Collaboration:
Become part of a community that appreciates art and puzzles. Collaborate on puzzles and engage in friendly competitions that foster creativity and connection.

Immersive Experience:
The game's visual effects and interactive elements create an immersive experience that goes beyond traditional puzzle-solving. Feel the brushstrokes, hear the rustle of the canvas, and lose yourself in the beauty of art.

For those who love art and puzzles, "Van Gogh's Masterpiece Jigsaw Puzzles" offers a unique blend of challenge, artistic delight, education, and community engagement, all enriched by the ability to unlock Steam Achievements. Immerse yourself in a world inspired by Van Gogh, filled with the charm of creativity and the joy of discovery. Perfect for an inspiring evening, surrounded by the beauty of art and the pleasure of puzzle-solving, this game is a masterpiece in itself, waiting to be explored."

item.title: Cat Bang
item.description:
About This Game

"Cat Bang" is a casual, mini puzzle game.


  • Create boxes
  • Open box
  • Click your kitten
Make your Kitten fell into the box. It's that simple.

item.title: Neon Nova
item.description:
About This Game

Immerse yourself in a futuristic world brimming with vibrant energy and intense arena battles with our groundbreaking Arena Ship Shooter. Neon Nova seamlessly blends fast-paced action, stunning neon aesthetics, and thrilling game modes for an unforgettable gaming experience.

Neon-Styled Atmosphere

Experience the thrill of a neon-drenched universe where vibrant colors and dynamic lighting effects bring the gameplay to life.

Diverse Game Modes

Engage in different game modes, whether it's classic Deathmatch, Checkpoint-Race or challenging Survival modes. Each mode offers a unique gameplay experience, upgrade your ship with Power Up's and ensuring hours of gaming excitement.

Customizable Spaceships

Tailor your ship to your personal style. Unlock new skins and colors to stand out in the arena and dominate your opponents in intergalactic combat.

Intuitive Controls

Enjoy seamless and intuitive controls, allowing you to navigate effortlessly through the neon arena and execute precise maneuvers in the heat of battle.

Challenging Enemies

Face a variety of challenging enemies, from skilled AI opponents to challenging arena fights. Each battle is unique, requiring tactical skill and quick reflexes.


Prepare to dive into the future of the Arena Ship Shooter with Neon Nova. Unlock skins, become the master of the arena, and dominate the neon universe!

Steam Deck Setup

If the game doesn't start on the Steam Deck, you need to go to the Steam library, select the game, go to 'Settings > Properties > Compatibility,' enable the Compatibility tool, and choose "Steam Linux Runtime."

Steam Deck Controller Setup

If you experience issues with the right stick while playing, go to the controller settings for the game on the Steam Deck (press the Steam button) and adjust the Death zone (slightly increase the left slider).

item.title: Beacon of Havoc
item.description:
About This Game

In this post-apocalyptic city builder, your skills are vital to humanity's survival. Build, defend, and thrive in a desolate landscape overrun by threats.

Establish your settlement amidst the ruins, placing defenses and constructing an intricate network of production facilities to gather resources essential for your survival. From salvaged materials to precious remnants of a lost era, every resource is a lifeline.

Fend off relentless waves of enemies with powerful turrets and strategically placed landmines. Upgrade your defenses and adapt to increasingly formidable foes, each encounter is a test of your planning and ingenuity.

The fate of your community rests on your ability to expand, research more advanced technologies, and unlock the secrets of a forgotten world. Develop manufacturing plants to provide essential supplies, trade and manage production pushing the boundaries of what's possible in this harsh new reality.

Choose your path wisely as you navigate the delicate balance between progress and security. Will you lead your settlement to prosperity, or will the relentless threats of this unforgiving world bring about its downfall?

item.title: Freddy's Archives: Remains Of The Past
item.description:
About This Game

=| WELCOME TO FREDDY`S ARCHIVE |=





An old company focused on creating entertaining eateries featuring singing animatronics - closes down after a series of accidents. Several attempts to rebuild fail, the company's reputation is permanently tarnished, and they fade into the shadows. One of the former owners leaves town, and a warehouse is built on the site of his house to store the equipment and property of the former restaurants. After many years, an advertisement appears in the newspapers for a night guard position at the old abandoned "Freddy`s Archive" warehouse

-|[A QUIET CITY WITH A SAD PAST:]|-

Local journalist Alex receives a letter from his long-missing father, asking him to visit an old family warehouse to learn more about his life. Fearing danger, he calls his friends to join him. Together, they travel far beyond the city to find something that was hidden long ago...
Meanwhile, there are sudden earthquakes in the city, causing the inhabitants of the city to be in danger, and some are forced to leave the city, while the rest believe that something bigger is involved, and all the clues lead to an old cursed warehouse not far outside the city called "Freddy`s Archive"




///Welcome to the Freddy's Archives:\\\

An adventure where you'll delve into the tragic history of a once-popular company as you uncover more and more eerie secrets! Will you be able to live up to their reputation, or will you confirm the old legends that haunt this place!

Something terrible is rising from the depths, something that should have been dead long ago is making itself known. trapped, you are not alone - old robots gripped by a strange energy are after you. Investigate the various locations, gather more details about the company's past affairs, and escape the clutches of creepiness and fear alive!

- You are alone in a small room and they are coming for you!


- Danger is behind every door, be more vigilant:


- Explore, and hide, they are faster than you!




You've never been alone...

item.title: Harmoni
item.description:
About This Game

Harmoni is an open Source 4 Key Rhythm Game Made In Lua/Love2D!
Press DFJK (keybind settings not currently added) to press the notes.

Comes with 1 songs included.

Currently 1 additional Song Pack is available. (more will be available in the future)
To download the Base Song pack, just run the game and press F1 in the Song Select menu to open the Song Packs Google Drive.

(currently the instructions.txt file included with the Base Song Pack is outdated, to install the Song Pack, download it, open it, and extract everything from inside the music.zip file to Harmoni’s Music folder (press F2 in the Song Select menu to open the Music folder.))

item.title: Purrs in Heaven
item.description:
About This Game

Poor Lanna has gone to heaven following a tragic accident. Fortunately, she has the chance to come back to life. Help the kitten pass all the tests and defeat the guardians, keepers of the 3 pieces of her soul. Do you accept the challenge?

Features

  • 30 game levels.
  • Simple puzzles of increasing difficulty.
  • Hidden shmup mini game.
  • Unlockable challenges and difficult mode for the most skillful.
  • Beautiful pixel art.
  • Wonderful soundtrack inspired by Ghibli composers.

item.title: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Q.P.I.D.
item.description:
About This Game



Happy Valentine's Day! Q.P.I.D. is the latest release from Digital Eclipse Arcade, a series of all-new games inspired by classic '80s arcade vibes.

Like everyone else on the internet, Q.P.I.D. loves cats. Unfortunately, the cats that the Quadrangular Programmable Inversion Device has been sworn to protect have gotten themselves into places they shouldn't be. With nerves of steel and a heart of gold, Q.P.I.D. is determined to rescue as many of them as possible, even if he has to bend the laws of physics to do it. Toggle gravity, blast enemies, avoid hazards, and collect cats before your battery runs out. Part platformer, part puzzler, Q.P.I.D. delivers a hero who's state of the heart.

Instructions

  • Flip gravity to move objects, enemies, and obstacles
  • Rescue cats on each level
  • Collect all hearts for a perfect score
  • Keep Q.P.I.D. juiced with charging stations

Hazards & Helpers

  • LOLLIDROPS aren't tasty — they're nasty. These mines will explode when you get near, but they won't be triggered by swapping gravity.
  • HEARTACHERS demand their personal space; get too close to these shuffling scorpions, and they'll zap you. They also devour hearts!
  • BEAM UPS shoot deadly laser light straight out when they're activated — but you can flip their switches when you flip the gravity.
  • WUVLIES make their way the only way they know how: End over end. You can blast these flipping foes, but beware — shortly after being incapacitated, they explode!
  • BIG CRUSHERS do exactly what their name implies: They crush (on) you big time. Don't get trapped beneath them!
  • HEARTIANS attack in swarms when disturbed and slow you down, so be ready to blast them all before they reach you.
  • SPEED ROLLERS give you a turbo boost. Walk through a light-blue column and get ready for a rapid ride!
  • BOUNCE PADS put a spring in your step, sending you skyward when shifting gravity might have some negative effects.
  • TETHERS automatically collect nearby hearts. Avoid entering dangerous spaces just by tugging on these heartstrings.

Gameplay Hints

  • Q.P.I.D. might fall faster or slower than some of the enemies and obstacles. Use that to sneak past them during gravity shifts.
  • Sometimes flipping gravity will put hearts right in the path of a Heartacher. Look for alternate locomotion paths like bounce pads and speed rollers to avoid that risk.
  • Lollidrops can't be destroyed by blasting them, but they can be deflected with a barrage of shots. Use this to create opportunities to sneak past them.

Game Controls

  • Move: Joystick/WASD
  • Blaster: Button 1/Mouse Button 1
  • Flip Gravity: Button 2/Mouse Button 2
  • Self Destruct: Button 1/Mouse Button 1 + Button 2/Mouse Button 2

Additional Options

  • F1 toggles CRT scanlines on/off
  • F2 toggles CRT curvature on/off
  • F3 switches in window size in windowed mode
  • Back button on controller accesses CRT/windowed options
  • F9 resets the game
  • Alt-Enter toggles between 16:9 fullscreen and 4:3 windowed mode

About Digital Eclipse Arcade


A series of throwback games made for the Digital Eclipse community, Digital Eclipse Arcade is a celebration of pure arcade gameplay. Sign up for the Digital Eclipse email newsletter to be the first to get exclusive drops.

item.title: Shanghai Summer
item.description:
About This Game



The Story

Shanghai, 2003

Suddenly, Baichuan senses something is not right with his life - sometimes, he feels he can see his memories, so real yet so unfamiliar. This all seems to begin with an unexpected invitation from Baichuan's ex-girlfriend, Qiuyu, who has been away for many years.

Twelve summer days, just like twelve lucid dreams...

"The time seems to be working anomalously on you."




The Characters

Dream-chasing, freelancer artist - Fengyi;
Troubled and misguided high school student - Xiaobo;
A university student who is burdened by her family's issue - Jingxian.
......

Even though their lives are a total mess, they still manage to carry on, embrace and accept their "regrets", and live to the fullest.




The Gameplay

Through the 'Topics' and 'Clues' gathered from everyday life, dive deep into the hearts and minds of your dearest friends.

To be comforted by them; To be inspired by them; To turn all the little things that happened in your life into your own strength, and eventually, at the finale of the twelfth night –

To " fix" the shattered dream.




The Stages

Classrooms, Bookstore "What-If", Neighbourhood Cafe...

Much of every boy and girl's life revolves around such a mundane city scene. And it is precisely within the mundanity that some new possibilities exist. The key to turning one's fate around may very much be held in the hand of someone passing by among the crowds on the streets...

item.title: Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost
item.description:
About This Game

『Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost』is a rebuild of Touhou Project's first officially approved smartphone rhythm game "Touhou Danmaku Kagura" as a standalone version.

Play Danmaku Kagura and collect the Mitama Cards, the Fragments of Memories to find the key to rebuild the now barren Phantasia.

Two different rhythm game experiences


■Kagura Stage
- In this mode you hit the notes at the right moment!
- You can stack up combos and get a high score by hitting the notes consecutively, coming through the 6 lanes.
- Over 160* arranged Touhou music will be playable with 4 different difficulties!
*Includes music from paid DLCs


■Danmaku Stage
- A totally new game experience that combines Danmaku shoot 'em up & Rhythm games!
- Hit the notes on the sides rhythmically and deal great damage to the boss!
- Complete missions set for each stages and beat the stage!


Wide Variety of Music


Contains 68 songs including the original Touhou music.
Scheduled to release 4 Music Pack DLCs (A total of 102 scores)!!



Additionally, free DLCs also planned for release. The first will include Toby Fox & ZUN’s collaboration song ‘U.N. Owen Was Hero?’, releasing February 8th!


Story


To rebuild Phantasia, Reimu journeys to find the Fragments of Memories.
The key to rebuilding is Danmaku Kagura.
To rebuild the Phantasia and unveil the truth of its destruction, Reimu have to gather Mitama cards, the Fragments of Memories.
Reimu's unending journey, begins.

Marisa begins her own journey to find Reimu
Will the two, ever meet eye to eye?

item.title: Mini Sports
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the world of Mini Sports, an online game that offers a variety of 1vs1 mini-games. Challenge players from around the world or invite your friends to compete with you in classic and fun games like 8-ball pool, racing, badminton, curling, mini golf, and archery.

🎱 8-Ball pool
The classic pool game where players take turns to pot all their balls.


🏎️ Racing
Compete in a race where the fastest to complete the laps wins. Use skillful driving to navigate the track and beat your opponent.


🏸 Badminton
Basically tennis but with a shuttlecock instead of a ball. Get the shuttlecock to the opponent's side and win points.


🥌 Curling
Take turns sliding stones on the ice and try to get your stone the closest to the center.


⛳ Mini Golf
Get your golf ball through the obstacles and into the hole.


🏹 Archery
Shoot arrows at the target and try to hit as close to the center as you can.


Are you ready prove your skills? Dive into Mini Sports now and let the games begin!

item.title: Jigsaw Puzzles Infinite
item.description:
About This Game

If you like jigsaw puzzles - this is your game.
Sit back, relax and build puzzles to your heart's content.

What you get with Jigsaw Puzzle Infinite:

  • Infinite possibilities- Choose from one of the dozens of included puzzles or add your own images without any limits
  • Classic mode - Jigsaw puzzles you know and love. Take your time and build the puzzle with the help of useful sorting features
  • Sorting - Sort pieces by section, sort out edges, or just spread them out neatly
  • Zen Mode - Enter the flow and assemble the puzzle piece by piece
  • Pieces snap to each other and are not placed on a preset grid - just like real puzzles
  • Adjust difficulty - Freely choose number of pieces and snapping distance
  • Different piece shapes - Choose from multiple possible shapes of the pieces
  • Free camera movement - Zoom in and out, and move around the board freely
  • Every puzzle unique - Pieces are randomized each time new puzzle is generated
  • Never lose any progress - Don't worry about losing data, autosaving will keep it safe
  • No microtransactions - Enjoy the puzzles up to 200 pieces or unlock all current and future content with a single purchase
